label: logicC:robotics_en
steps: [1] If the battery level is sufficient for boot, then the boot sequence proceeds.
[2] If the boot sequence proceeds, then the motion controller becomes ready.
[3] If the motion controller is ready and the emergency stop is released, then motion is authorized.
[5] The battery level is sufficient for boot.
[6] For any robot x, if x's perception module is active, then x detects obstacles.
[7] Robot a's perception module is active.
[8] For any robot x, if x detects obstacles, then x either plans an avoidance path or stops.
[9] Therefore the boot sequence proceeds (from [1] and [5]).
[10] Therefore the motion controller becomes ready (from [2] and [9]).
[12] Therefore robot a detects obstacles and either plans an avoidance path or stops (from [6], [7], and [8]).
